snippet.title: Slender: The Arrival - Official Gameplay Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Slender: The Arrival is a first-person survival horror game developed by Blue Isle Studios. Slender: The Arrival is receiving a 10th-anniversary upgrade being fitted with a new chapter and the implementation of Unreal Engine 5 that enhances the game's visuals. The new update also marks the first time the game arrives to current-generation platforms along with more language support. Slender: The Arrival launches on October 18 for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series S|X, and PC.

#SlenderTheArrival
